content: In Greek mythology, who is known as the goddess of wisdom and warfare, also the patron goddess of Athens?

In Greek mythology, the goddess known as the goddess of wisdom and warfare, and also the patron goddess of Athens, is Athena. She is one of the most important and revered deities in the Greek pantheon, often depicted wearing a helmet and carrying a shield. Her symbol is the olive tree, and she is associated with strategic warfare, wisdom, craft, and intelligence.
